dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: taxonInference
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about the area used to infer characteristics of plants of the same taxa that have either a similar height or diameter.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value to each unique record in the globalInference table.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the taxonObservation table.

attribute.attDefinition: This is the inferenece area used to characterize the plants of the same taxon having similar dimensions. These dimensions are defined in the inferenceClassIndex table and may be characterized be either height or diameter.
